name: S2019 Agent207
description:
Virus IX has infected over 75% of the world. MedCorp has developed a vaccine but has kept it a secret to gain control over the government.  Agent 207 is the only one who can save the day. Your objective is to make it through the facility collecting password fragments and key cards that lead you to the vaccine. Good luck! 

Instructions

-Use D and A to walk

-Use T to switch the camera view to see the entire level

-Use E to interact with objects (stairs, doors, and power boxes)
